001package edu.pdx.cs410J.web;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
007import java.util.Map;
008
009import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
010import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertTrue;
011
012/**
013 * Unit tests for the <code>HttpRequestHelper</code> class
014 */
015public class HttpRequestHelperTest {
016
017  private HttpRequestHelper helper = new HttpRequestHelper();
018
019  @Test
020  public void testGet() throws IOException {
021    HttpRequestHelper.Response response = helper.get("http://www.google.com", Map.of());
022    assertEquals(HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK, response.getCode());
023    assertTrue(response.getContent().contains("Google"));
024  }
025
026  @Test
027  public void testGetWithParameters() throws IOException {
028    HttpRequestHelper.Response response = helper.get("https://www.google.com/search", Map.of("p", "Java"));
029    assertEquals(HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK, response.getCode());
030    assertTrue(response.getContent().contains("Java"));
031
032  }
033}
